title: Improve docs on query parsing: embedded queries, uf (edismax)
description: The uf parameter is a space separated list (not comma). Furthermore the docs should be improved – see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SOLR-11501?focusedCommentId=16326592&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-16326592

comments.content: I think this is an inadvertent duplicate of SOLR-12081? Resolving as such, please reopen if I got that wrong.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett
